about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2579020/Idol_VS_Furries/

Trump has been captured.
Go free him with your weapons and in TPS sight.
6 various firearms + 2 formidable Alien weapons
Multiple enemies, each with their own specialty
Is a tps game where you have to save Trump who is being held prisoner in a KGB bunker
All in a dystopia in which the USSR is still standing.
Primary and Secondary objectives.
And a colorful soundtrack.

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
The events that are presented in the game are not real.
This game has no political resonance.
Any resemblance to real people or places is only coincidental.
The characters are fictional and have no effect in reality.

name: Trump Loves Russia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 4Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI or AMD R9 280X or Better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Trump has been captured by the KGB and is being held in a bunker on a Soviet base. A dystopian adventure in which the USSR is still standing.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
